title: In the Hands of a Professional
description: Emma Southhead has been single and celibate ever since she launched her own business. The irony is, she's the brains behind the biggest-selling dating app of all time. She’s smart, beautiful, a complete workaholic - and she’s worth a fortune.Emma's friends think it's high time she got back in the saddle. So as a generous birthday gift, they book her a night with the city’s most in-demand male escort, Harley Dean. Harley is not only skilled in the bedroom, he’s also well educated, good with his hands, and drop-dead gorgeous. When the two meet, the chemistry is electric and they connect straight away. But is it all part of the service or is there something deeper?If you’re looking for a short, fast-moving steamy romance that sizzles, you won’t be disappointed.Pretty Woman for the 21st Century.
author: Jerrica Hartstone
